channel.title: I get an error, with my handler "cannot find symbol"
channel.description:
Hi,
I made 2 handlers, with one of the handlers one of which was an animation handler, in my NPChandler, I had this code:
[code]plr.startAnimation(plr.GetBlockAnim(plr.playerEquipment[plr.playerWeapon]));[/code]
Because "GetBlockAnim is in my handler, I got a cannot find symbol, So, I tried to replace it with this:
[code]plr.startAnimation(plr.server.AnimationHandler.GetBlockAnim(wearID,playerId)(plr.playerEquipment[plr.playerWeapon]));[/code]
But, I got this error:
[code]NPCHandler.java:1557: ')' expected plr.startAnimation(plr.server.An imationHandler.GetBlockAnim(wearID,playerId)(plr.playerEquipment[plr.playerWeapo n]));
^ NPCHandler.java:1557: not a statement plr.startAnimation(plr.server.An imationHandler.GetBlockAnim(wearID,playerId)(plr.playerEquipment[plr.playerWeapo n]));
^ NPCHandler.java:1557: ';' expected plr.startAnimation(plr.server.An imationHandler.GetBlockAnim(wearID,playerId)(plr.playerEquipment[plr.playerWeapo n]));
^ 3 errors Server Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Does anyone now how to fix it?
Thanks
Musicmad

item.title: I get an error, with my handler "cannot find symbol"
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

Hi,

I made 2 handlers, with one of the handlers one of which was an animation handler, in my NPChandler, I had this code:

plr.startAnimation(plr.GetBlockAnim(plr.playerEquipment[plr.playerWeapon]));

Because "GetBlockAnim is in my handler, I got a cannot find symbol, So, I tried to replace it with this:

plr.startAnimation(plr.server.AnimationHandler.GetBlockAnim(wearID,playerId)(plr.playerEquipment[plr.playerWeapon]));

But, I got this error:

[code]NPCHandler.java:1557: ‘)’ expected
plr.startAnimation(plr.server.An
imationHandler.GetBlockAnim(wearID,playerId)(plr.playerEquipment[plr.playerWeapo
n]));

                                        ^

NPCHandler.java:1557: not a statement
plr.startAnimation(plr.server.An
imationHandler.GetBlockAnim(wearID,playerId)(plr.playerEquipment[plr.playerWeapo
n]));

                                                            ^

NPCHandler.java:1557: ‘;’ expected
plr.startAnimation(plr.server.An
imationHandler.GetBlockAnim(wearID,playerId)(plr.playerEquipment[plr.playerWeapo
n]));

^
3 errors
Server Compiled Successfully!
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

Does anyone now how to fix it?

Thanks

Musicmad
